 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַרְבִּית‎</span> **noun feminine** ==increment, interest, usury== (= <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַרְבִּית‎</span> **1 b**; compare (on both) Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> IV. ***take usury***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***interest, usury***, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Saalschütz<sup>Mos. Recht (ii. 1848), 859</sup> Hoelemann<sup>Letzte Bibelstud. (1885), 297 f.</sup> [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>[[Lev.25.36|Lev 25:36]]</sup> [[BDB#Benn|Benn]]<sup>Hast. DB DEBT</sup>); — always absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span>: + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֶשֶׁךְ‎</span> [[Lev.25.36|Lev 25:36]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), [[Ezek.18.17|Ezek 18:17]]; [[Ezek.22.12|Ezek 22:12]]; [[Prov.28.8|Prov 28:8]] \|\| ***id.*** [[Ezek.18.8|Ezek 18:8]]; [[Ezek.18.13|Ezek 18:13]].
